name: jsonplaceholder-tests
description: Colección de pruebas CRUD automatizadas con Postman + Newman

scripts.test:dev: set ts=%date:~6,4%%date:~3,2%%date:~0,2%_%time:~0,2%%time:~3,2% && newman run ./jsonplaceholder_tests.postman_collection.json -e ./dev.postman_environment.json -d ./data/posts_data.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/report_dev_%ts%.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "API JsonPlaceholder – Dev %ts%"
scripts.test:qa: set ts=%date:~6,4%%date:~3,2%%date:~0,2%_%time:~0,2%%time:~3,2% && newman run ./jsonplaceholder_tests.postman_collection.json -e ./qa.postman_environment.json -d ./data/posts_data.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/report_qa_%ts%.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "API JsonPlaceholder – QA %ts%"
scripts.test:prod: set ts=%date:~6,4%%date:~3,2%%date:~0,2%_%time:~0,2%%time:~3,2% && newman run ./jsonplaceholder_tests.postman_collection.json -e ./prod.postman_environment.json -d ./data/posts_data.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/report_prod_%ts%.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "API JsonPlaceholder – Prod %ts%"
scripts.test:qa-sim: set ts=%date:~6,4%%date:~3,2%%date:~0,2%_%time:~0,2%%time:~3,2% && newman run ./jsonplaceholder_tests.postman_collection.json -e ./qa_simulated.postman_environment.json --folder "Negativos" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/report_qasim_%ts%.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "API JsonPlaceholder – QA Sim (Negativos) %ts%"
scripts.test:flow: newman run ./jsonplaceholder_tests.postman_collection.json -e ./qa.postman_environment.json -d ./data/posts_data.json --folder "Flow DDT" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/report_flow.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "API JsonPlaceholder – Flow DDT"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:dev && npm run test:qa && npm run test:qa-sim && npm run test:prod && npm run test:flow
